name: limbo
description:
"Fico criando vários loop de pensamento, um em cima do outro.
Foda é isso, não é nem um depois do outro, pensa um bagulho, deixa passar e vem outro.
É um em cima do outro, mano.
Pensa num bagui antes mesmo de terminar de pensar, nóis já tá com a mente lá em outro pensamento, em automático carai."

–

"I keep creating multiple thought loops, one on top of the other.
It’s fucking awful, it’s not even one thought after the other, think something, let it go and then another one comes. 
It’s one on top of the other, bro. 
Think about something and even before finish that reasoning, we already have our mind there on another thought, on automatic, damn.”

/////
 
This piece is from the collection "descartável", which is a audiovisual project that I discarded bad feelings and turned it into something that could heal me. The project addresses mental health issues, self knowledge and it was a opportunity to me to study animation. This is the 29th piece of the collection.
